description:
Ansem (@blknoiz06) is scheduled to fight Barney (@barneytheboi) on April 19, 2024 in Dubai. You can view this post to learn more: https://twitter.com/RookieXBT/status/1765082785126219980

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Barney (@barneytheboi) cries at any point while on camera while at the venue of his fight with Ansem scheduled for April 19, 2024 in Dubai. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, 'crying' is defined as the visible shedding of tears that can be clearly observed on Barney's face. The 'crying' can take place at any time Barney is on camera and present at the fight venue even if the fight isn't ongoing.

This market will resolve to "No" if barney has left the venue after the fight and did not end up crying.

The primary resolution source for this market will be footage of the fight, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

markets.question: Will Barney cry?

title: Will Barney cry?
